title: Cauliflower and kale hash with fried egg and hollandaise
description: Here's a terrific light meal for two. The veg is  packed with flavour and spices, simply served with fried eggs. Go the extra mile and make your own hollandaise for something special.
ingredients: 400g/14oz cauliflower, chopped into small bite-size pieces
2 small handfuls of kale, stems removed, roughly chopped
small handful of chives, finely chopped
